title: Ashes in the Trevi Fountain
description: a story of love, loss grief and the journey out the other side.Meeting the man of your dreams after many years of waiting seems too good to be true. It is. After a few short years of wonderful marriage the love of my life is taken by cancer and I am left to rebuild my life again.I start by travelling through Jordan, France and then returning to Rome, the city we both loved. I am there to fulfill a promise I made that he would return to the Trevi Fountain. Once those ashes floated out of my hand and mingled with the crystal clear water my new life began. From Italy to Morocco and back home. A story filled with happiness, sadness, flavours, smells and above all love.
author: Neni
